title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – CLI and Go library for pulling, running and chatting with Llama-2, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc. locally via a REST-style API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API; works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama API with sync & async clients.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you use any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced Node CLI for Ollama with conversation history, prompt templates and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: Drop-in replacement for GitHub Copilot using Ollama models inside VS Code.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and streaming support.

title: ollama-rag (PrivateGPT-ollama)
summary: PrivateGPT fork that uses Ollama for local LLM and embeddings, enabling fully private RAG.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose (eugeneyan/ollama-docker)
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Postgres, Weaviate for RAG.

title: ollama-helm (ollama-helm/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector support.

title: ollama-gpt-pilot
summary: GPT-Pilot fork that swaps OpenAI for Ollama to generate entire codebases locally.

title: ollama-cody (sourcegraph/ollama-cody)
summary: Sourcegraph Cody extension configured to use Ollama models for code chat and autocomplete.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama with OpenAI-format endpoints.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-rag-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embeddings integration for building local RAG pipelines with Ollama.

title: ollama-npm-package (npm: ollama)
summary: Official NPM package providing TypeScript wrappers for the Ollama API (same repo as ollama-js).
